results.body: New Yorkers’ life span dropped by 4.6 years in 2020 from the previous year. Health officials say it may take the city years to recover.
results.title: Covid Was Bad in New York City. See How Bad on a 200-Year Timeline.

results.body: After a tumultuous few years, many hoped that the housing market would improve this spring. No such luck — for buyers or sellers.

nytd_org: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)

results.title: Buying or Selling a Home? Welcome to the Year of Disappointment

results.body: Deaths among children are now driving the country’s life expectancy declines.
results.title: It’s Not ‘Deaths of Despair.’ It’s Deaths of Children.

results.body: While he has not yet announced his plans, he filed the federal paperwork for a campaign to run as a Democrat.
results.title: Robert Kennedy Jr., a Noted Vaccine Skeptic, Files to Run for President

results.body: Scientists from the Chinese C.D.C. confirmed that DNA from raccoon dogs and other animals susceptible to the coronavirus was found at the market in early 2020.

nytd_org: Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention

results.title: China Publishes Data Showing Raccoon Dog DNA at Wuhan Market

results.body: As the nation’s schools ‘return to normal,’ teachers in an L.A. neighborhood hit hard by Covid are left to manage their students’ grief — and their own.
results.title: The School Where the Pandemic Never Ended

results.body: Federal regulators plan to authorize an additional dose for seniors and immunocompromised people in the coming weeks, ahead of the introduction of a newly formulated booster later in the year.
results.byline: By Noah Weiland and Sharon LaFraniere
results.title: F.D.A. Plans to Allow a Second Updated Covid Booster for Vulnerable Americans

results.body: Politics probably explain America’s poor life expectancy.
results.title: Understanding the Red State Death Trip

results.body: Brands seem determined to make the most of the bounce in luxury spending that they have anticipated since Beijing ended its zero-Covid policy.
results.title: Swiss Watch Leaders Are Eager to Make Up for Lost Time in China

results.body: As the hype around household names became overwhelming, some collectors turned to makers like Moritz Grossmann and Furlan Marri.
results.title: Joy in Little-Known Watch Brands
